concept.title: Generate test steps in script view

conbody.p: Once a new test case is created, you can switch to the using the corresponding tab at the bottom of the test case editor. Test steps specified in the are translated into a Groovy script in .

By using the import statement in a test script, you can reference to the classes you wish to use. Expand the section to see all default imported classes by . The name after 'as' in each import statement is an alias for the class. You can change the alias for each class. These classes are necessary for composing a test script.
